title: "Is artificial intelligence reinventing insurance?"
excerpt: "He was speaking at the recent 'Robotics, Drones and AI in Insurance' conference, held in Rosebank, Johannesburg. In answer to the question, Hoggarth clarified that no, he did not believe that artificial intelligence (AI) was changing the nature of insurance – at least, not on its own. “My view is that AI is not reinventing insurance ..."
